title: Minecraft 基岩版 1.14.0 发布
author: zyjking
txt_content:
本帖最后由 zyjking 于 2019-12-14 15:16 编辑 

Minecraft 基岩版是指包括Minecraft 手机版（Android、IOS）、Win10版（VR）、主机版（XboxOne、NS、PS4）在内，使用“基岩引擎”（C++语言）开发的Minecraft统一版本。
正式版是Minecraft 基岩版经过一段时间的测试版测试之后得到的稳定版本，也是众多材质、Addon和官方领域服会逐渐跟进的版本。与此同时Google Play、Win10 Store等官方软件商店也会推送此次更新。
https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360037105792

New Features:
新特性：

PlayStation4PS4
Welcome PlayStation4 players to the Bedrock version of Minecraft! All Bedrock platforms can now cross-play with PS4? consoles. More information can be found in the Minecraft for PlayStation?4 FAQ.热烈欢迎PS4加入基岩版大家庭！所有基岩版平台现均可与PS4联机。更多信息请查看FAQ

Bees!蜜蜂！
Bees are cute, fuzzy, neutral mobs可爱又毛茸茸的中立生物！Don’t hurt them, they don’t want to hurt you别伤害它们，它们也不会伤害你Bees love pretty flowers and spend their lives gathering pollen from them非常爱花，无时无刻都在传授花粉After gathering pollen, bees fly back to their nest收集花粉后会飞回自己的蜂巢If a bee can't find pollen, it will return home如果找不到花粉就会回家If a bee doesn’t have a home nest, it will wander around until it finds one it can use如果蜜蜂没有蜂巢，那它会在周围游荡，直到找到新家为止Bees don’t like the rain and they sleep at night. They will return to their nest in these cases蜜蜂不喜欢下雨，晚上会睡觉，下雨或者睡觉时它们会回到蜂巢中

Bee Nests and Beehives蜂巢和蜂箱
Bee Nests generate in Flower Forests, Plains, and Sunflower Plains biomes会在繁花森林，平原以及向日葵平原自然生成When a bee visits a nest and completes its journey undisturbed, the level of honey increases如果采蜜返回过程中没有被其它因素干扰，采集的蜂蜜浓度等级将会增加Using shears on a full hive or nest will harvest Honeycomb and using a glass bottle will give a Honey Bottle使用剪刀即可从蜂箱或蜂巢收集蜜脾，同时也可用瓶子装取蜂蜜瓶Campfire smoke calms bees - Place one underneath the nest or hive to keep them in chill mode营火是镇静剂——将营火熏蜂巢/蜂箱可以让蜜蜂冷静下来Redstone friendly! Dispensers can shear honeycombs from hives and nests针对红石十分友好！可以在发射器中用剪刀从蜂箱或蜂巢中收集蜜脾

Honey Block蜂蜜方块
Greatly reduces movement speed and jump height, but also reduces fall damage你的移动速度和跳跃高度会降低很多，但摔落伤害也会降低很多You can “slide” down a wall of honey blocks to slow your fall (Parkour FTW!)]你可以在方块上滑行，让你摔的没那么惨（开始跑酷吧，看谁是赢家！）When a honey block is piston-moved, adjacent blocks also move被活塞推动时，相邻方块也会随之移动When a honey block is piston-moved, entities on top are moved along with it被活塞推动时，方块上方的实体也会跟着移动

Honeycomb Block蜜脾方块
A decorative block that can be crafted with Honeycomb这是一种装饰性方块，可以用蜜脾制作而成

Changes:
更改：

Updated to a fresh menu background full of bees把菜单背景更新成嗡嗡蜂群Leads can now be used on Polar Bears, Parrots, Ocelots, and Dolphins (MCPE-46866)可以正常对北极熊，鹦鹉，豹猫和海豚使用栓绳了Dispensers can now fill bottles with water and honey可以用发射器装填水瓶和蜂蜜瓶Tweaked the amount of XP dropped by animals to match Java Edition为了匹配Java版，修改了杀死动物掉落的经验
Most animals will now drop 1-3 XP when killed, but Dolphins now drop 0 XP一般会掉落1-3经验，但海豚没有经验
Item tags can now be hidden in the inventory using the '/gamerule showtags' command现在可以使用/gamerule showtags命令在UI中隐藏物品标签

For Map Makers and Add-On Creators:
给地图和附加包制作者：
Updated templates for 1.14.0 with new resources, BEEhaviors, documentation, and example packs can be downloaded from minecraft.net/addons将模板升级至1.14.0的版本。里面包含了新材质，蜜蜂行为包，文档手册和示例包，可以从minecraft.net/addons下载

bug修复：
修复了41个bug：

Crashes / Performance崩溃/性能
Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay修复了游玩时可能发生的崩溃问题Fixed a crash that could occur when signing into Xbox Live on Android修复了登录Xbox Live时闪退的问题Fixed an issue with kelp growth causing lag in specific chunks (MCPE-50175)修复了由海带生长导致的区块延迟问题

General常规
Fixed a render distance issue that could cause an old style (limited) world to not load correctly if a player logged out in a specific corner of that world修复了如果玩家在存档特定边缘退出游戏时发生的因渲染距离出错导致旧世界无法正常加载的问题Fixed an issue that was causing scripting error messages to show on the Alien Worlds Marketplace world修复了市场中的“Alien Worlds”世界导致的脚本报错问题

Gameplay游玩
Fixed a bug that was sometimes causing chests to become invisible (MCPE-52790)修复有时箱子会隐形的问题Fixed an issue that could sometimes cause touch screen controls to become inverted (MCPE-50256)修复了轻触屏幕控件有时会反转控制的问题Players once again experience kinetic energy and get dead upon gliding into walls at high speed with Elytra (MCPE-21141)用鞘翅高速滑翔会被撞死了Players can no longer initiate swimming in shallow water玩家再也不能在浅水（一格高）中游泳了

Mobs怪物
Improved the accuracy of pathfinding for flying mobs优化飞行怪物的寻路机制Pillager Patrols can no longer spawn in the End or Nether dimensions (MCPE-51481)掠夺者巡逻队不会在地狱和末地生成了Baby Pigmen now hold their swords in their hands, rather than around their necks (MCPE-53454)修复了小猪人拿剑的模型“刺穿脖子”的问题

Blocks方块
Updated the Slime Block texture to match Java Edition史莱姆方块的材质与Java版一样了Fixed an issue that was causing sugar cane to break when a nearby water source became waterlogged (MCPE-52314)修复了附近方块含水时甘蔗会被自动收割的问题

Items物品
Arrows and tridents no longer fall through the ground after being deflected by a shield (MCPE-44721)箭或三叉戟被盾牌格挡后不会再没入地下了Dragon Heads now appear at the correct height (MCPE-53129)修复了龙头在方块上放置的高度不正确的问题Buckets can once again be used to milk cows (MCPE-54623)桶能再次被用来装牛奶了Milk buckets can again be used to craft cakes (MCPE-52774)牛奶桶可以被正确使用来做蛋糕了Fixed acacia leaves sometimes becoming stuck in the inventory hotbar修复了有时金合欢树叶会卡在物品栏里用不了的问题Placing Armor on an Armor Stand in Creative mode no longer equips it on the player as well创造模式下（点击或右键）放置盔甲时不会再进行穿戴了

Character Creator角色创建器
Various fixes to the Character Creator各种bug修复Fixed an issue that was causing worn items to transfer between Character Creator models unexpectedly修复了坏掉的东西无法在两个模型之间正常同步转移的问题Adding or removing the Founder's Cape now updates the skin in-game without needing to restart在角色创建器中添加或移除Founder披风时不需重启即可在游戏内更新皮肤了Platform restricted skins can now be previewed in the Character Creator可以预览受限的皮肤了（不是“跨设备可用”的皮肤）Fixed capes not rendering in some skin packs (MCPE-54181)修复披风不会在某些皮肤包被渲染的问题Fixed another issue that was causing player skins to revert to a default Alex or Steve after relaunching the game修复了另一个重启游戏后会导致皮肤恢复成默认的Steve或Alex的问题Skins that don't roam to Minecraft Earth no longer display 'Usable Everywhere' in the Character Creator不会同步到Minecraft Earth的皮肤不会再显示“跨设备可用”了Equipping a new custom skin will now update the player model without needing to restart the game无需重启游戏即可刷新玩家皮肤模型了Optimized the size of Character Creator skins to improve performance when playing in multiplayer调整角色创建器中皮肤的大小，同时优化多人游玩时的性能

Graphical图形界面
Fixed the held item bobbing animation when moving in first person view (MCPE-51212)修复了第一人称视角中移动时手持物品的物品摆动动画异常的问题The block breaking animation will again show if a block is below water when the player is above修复了玩家在水上，方块在水下破坏方块没有破坏动画的问题The player's hand no longer disappears when gliding with Elytra (MCPE-53092)修复了用鞘翅飞行时手臂消失不见的问题Water now renders correctly when Kelp is placed next to a Glass block修复了海带放在玻璃方块旁时水的渲染问题

User Interface用户界面
Fixed a navigation issue that could cause an incorrect focus change when choosing an option from the pause menu修复了从暂停菜单中更改设置时会导致应用设置不正常的导向问题Fixed an issue that could cause menu flickering when navigating through the Character Creator修复了导向角色创建器时一些UI可能会狂闪的问题The 'See Pack in Store' button in the Character Creator can now be highlighted and selected when using a controller角色创造器中“在商店中查看资源包”按钮可以用控制器高亮和选中Fixed some misspelled splash text修复了一些闪烁标语的拼写错误

Add-Ons and Script EngineAdd-Ons和脚本引擎
Custom entities once again show their health bar correctly while being ridden骑行实体时会正常显示生命条了Fixed an issue with particle billboarding that was causing them to appear flipped in the wrong direction修复了告示牌的粒子会导致牌子的方向发生180度翻转的问题Fixed an issue with pivot points for custom geometry cube models修复了自定义的3D几何模型轴心点不正确的问题Fixed a bug that was causing tamed entity damage to be counted as coming from mounted players修复了导致玩家骑乘导致驯服的实体损坏的问题

（绝大部分翻译来自1.14测试版新闻帖）
